org.activebpel.rt.util
Class AeMutex

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.util.AeMutex
public class AeMutex
extends java.lang.Object

Implements mutual exclusion monitor that supports reentrant locking.

Nested Class Summary

          The internal id for this mutex.

Field Detail

sDebug

private static boolean sDebug
true if and only if debug capabilities enabled.

sNextMutexId

private static int sNextMutexId
The next available mutex id.

mMutexId

private final int mMutexId
The internal id for this mutex. Used by toString().

mOwnershipCount

private int mOwnershipCount
The ownership count, which is the number of times that the owner must call releaseMutex() to relinquish ownership. The count is 0 if no thread owns the mutex.

mOwner

private java.lang.Thread mOwner
The thread that owns this mutex or null if no thread owns the mutex.

mStackTrace

private AeMutex.AeMutexStackTrace mStackTrace
Diagnostic stack trace.
